content.rendered:
Our colleagues at ForexBrokers.com, a popular online resource to get broker reviews and valuable information on trading conditions has published its 4th annual review of some of the world’s prominent brokers. The annual review takes a rigorous approach to reviewing brokers in detail, and according to Steven Hatzakis, Global Director of Research, Forex & Crypto at ForexBrokers.com     took 5 months to complete.

The results of the review can be viewed here.

Readers will be glad to see that ForexBrokers rates each firm based on a number of criteria, including the following, which plays a part in determining the overall rating for each broker that was reviewed:

  • Commissions & Fees
  • Offering of Investments
  • Platforms & Tools
  • Research
  • Customer Service
  • Mobile Trading
  • Education

In his letter announcing the review, Mr. Hatzakis commented that “looking back at 2019, the best forex brokers continued to expand and personalize their research offerings. Additionally, they tweaked their web-based and mobile trading platforms for traders, as well as launched new products to increase their range of tradeable assets”.

We encourage traders of all experience levels or those interested in trading to use ForexBrokers.com to find valuable information on brokers’ particular trading conditions and offerings to determine the best fit for their trading strategy or education.
